类 SysUserController

    @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="${gx-cloud.serve.gx-cloud-system.context-path}{version}/user")
 @ApiVersion
public class SysUserController
extends cn.gx.tool.core.bean.controller.BaseController<SysUser,ISysUserService>
